elm:element.code: [a997cc03-3e99-40eb-833a-6374c7750a3a Observation procedure (procedure)] ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[1e53d17c-cd1c-4251-ae9a-f7b999178c90 |Breast cancer genetic marker of susceptibility finding]

[a997cc03-3e99-40eb-833a-6374c7750a3a Observation procedure (procedure)] ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[1e53d17c-cd1c-4251-ae9a-f7b999178c90 |Breast cancer genetic marker of susceptibility finding (finding)]

elm:annotation.a:s: Opening of the patient record during an encounter in either a primary care clinic, an OB/GYN or during a women's health outpatient visit

def.name: Activation of the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule

elm:annotation.a:s: Activation of the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule.

elm:expression.elm:annotation: Every month on day 1 of the month.

elm:annotation.a:s: Gender is female
Age >=40

prompt.value: Patient declines early breast cancer screening.
Patient desires to continue breast cancer screening.
Patient has a personal history of breast cancer.
Patient has a life expectancy of greater than 10 years.

elm:annotation.a:s: Age >=40 and <45
Does not decline early breast cancer screening.
Does not have a documented mammography screening interval.
Has not had mammography within 12 months.
Does not have a personal history of breast cancer.
Does not have prior chest radiotherapy at a young age (up to age 30).
Does not have a suspected or known mutation of a gene such as BRCA that increases the risk of breast cancer.

title.value: Outpatient Visit, Age >=40 to <45 Years, Desires Early Breast Cancer Screening

textEquivalent.value: Set screening interval to annual.
Notify the provider that options for breast cancer screening should be discussed with patient and that the discussion should be documented.

elm:value.code: [409073007 |Education (procedure)] ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[268547008 |Screening for malignant neoplasm of breast (procedure)]

textEquivalent.value: Activate the breast cancer screening history section of the documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer risk assessment of the documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule.

elm:annotation.a:s: Age >=40 and <45
Declines early breast cancer screening.
Does not have a documented mammography screening interval.
Has not had mammography within 12 months.
Does not have a personal history of breast cancer.
Does not have prior chest radiotherapy at a young age (up to age 30).
Does not have a suspected or known mutation of a gene such as BRCA that increases the risk of breast cancer.

title.value: Outpatient Visit, Age >=40 to <45 Years, No Desire for Early Breast Cancer Screening

textEquivalent.value: Activate declines breast cancer screening section of the documentation template.
Set screening interval to declines early breast cancer screening.

elm:annotation.a:s: Age >=45 and <55
Has not had mammography within 12 months.
Does not have a personal history of breast cancer.
Does not have prior chest radiotherapy at a young age (up to age 30).
Does not have a suspected or known mutation of a gene such as BRCA that increases the risk of breast cancer.

textEquivalent.value: Set screening interval to annual.
Notify the provider that options for breast cancer screening should be discussed with patient and that the discussion should be documented.

elm:value.code: [409073007 |Education (procedure)] ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[268547008 |Screening for malignant neoplasm of breast (procedure)]

textEquivalent.value: Activate the breast cancer screening history section of the documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer risk assessment of the documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule.

elm:annotation.a:s: Age >=55 and <75
Has not had mammography within 12 months.
Does not have a documented mammography screening interval.
Does not have a personal history of breast cancer.
Does not have prior chest radiotherapy at a young age (up to age 30).
Does not have a suspected or known mutation of a gene such as BRCA that increases the risk of breast cancer.

title.value: Outpatient Visit, Age gt;=55 to <75 Years

textEquivalent.value: Set screening interval to biennial.
Notify the provider that options for breast cancer screening should be discussed with patient and that the discussion should be documented.

elm:value.code: [409073007 |Education (procedure)] ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[268547008 |Screening for malignant neoplasm of breast (procedure)]

textEquivalent.value: Activate the breast cancer screening history section of the documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer screening documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule.

elm:annotation.a:s: Age >=75
Has a life expectancy greater than 10 years.
Desires to continue breast cancer screening.
Has not had mammography within 12 months.
Does not have a mammography screening interval set to "stop screening."
Does not have a personal history of breast cancer.
Does not have prior chest radiotherapy at a young age (up to age 30).
Does not have a suspected or known mutation of a gene such as BRCA that increases the risk of breast cancer.

title.value: Outpatient Visit, Age >=75 Years, Desires to Continue Screening

textEquivalent.value: Set screening interval to biennial.
Notify the provider that options for breast cancer screening should be discussed with patient and that the discussion should be documented.

elm:value.code: [409073007 |Education (procedure)] ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[268547008 |Screening for malignant neoplasm of breast (procedure)]

textEquivalent.value: Activate the breast cancer screening history section of the documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer screening documentation template.
Activate the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule.

elm:annotation.a:s: Age >=75
Has a life expectancy greater than 10 years.
Desires to stop breast cancer screening.
Has not had mammography within 12 months.
Does not have a mammography screening interval set to "stop screening."
Does not have a personal history of breast cancer.
Does not have prior chest radiotherapy at a young age (up to age 30).
Does not have a suspected or known mutation of a gene such as BRCA that increases the risk of breast cancer.

title.value: Outpatient Visit, Age >=75 Years, Desires to Stop Screening

textEquivalent.value: Set screening interval to stop screening.

elm:operand.name: Activation of the breast cancer screening order set ECA rule

elm:annotation.a:s: Does not decline screening at this time.

title.value: Breast Cancer Screening Order Set ECA Rule

textEquivalent.value: Activate the breast cancer screening order set.

elm:annotation.a:s: Does not decline screening at this time.

textEquivalent.value: Notify the patient of their Breast Cancer Screening due date.

logic.elm:annotation: Facility does not use auto-generated patient notifications.x

textEquivalent.value: Add the patient to the report of patients due for breast cancer screening with their Breast Cancer Screening due date.
